about.title: About LooView
about.p1: LooView is a community-driven platform dedicated to helping people find clean, safe, and reliable public restrooms. We believe that access to good toilet facilities is a basic necessity, and our mission is to make this information easily accessible to everyone, everywhere.
about.p2: With a blend of user-generated reviews, photos, and detailed feature tagging, LooView aims to take the guesswork out of finding a suitable loo, whether you're in your hometown or traveling the globe. We also inject a bit of humor into the often-taboo topic of toilets, because why not?

item1.question: How do I add a new toilet to LooView?
item1.answer: Easy peasy! Just click the 'Share Your Experience' or 'Add Toilet' button, fill in the details like name, location (you can use the map!), features, and your rating. A photo helps too! The more info, the better for everyone.

item2.question: Can I edit a toilet I've added or a review I've written?
item2.answer: Currently, direct editing of submissions isn't available. If you've made a significant error, please contact support with the details, and we'll assist. We're working on making edits easier in the future!

item3.question: What kind of photos should I upload?
item3.answer: Show us the reality! Clean or messy, we want to see it. Good photos include the toilet itself, sink area, overall cleanliness, and any special features (like a baby changing station or accessibility aids). Please avoid photos with people in them for privacy reasons.

item4.question: How is the average rating calculated?
item4.answer: The average rating is a simple mean of all user ratings for that specific toilet. More reviews lead to a more accurate average, so keep 'em coming!

item5.question: I found an inappropriate review or photo. What should I do?
item5.answer: Please report it immediately! Use the 'Report a Problem' feature (details below) or contact us directly. We take community safety and content appropriateness very seriously.
